section.title: Description
section.p: Contains pointers to a small subset of ICD-9CM codes which pertain to Audiology and Speech Pathology. Entries in this file are pointed to by the Diagnostic Code field in the A&amp;SP Clinic Visit file. (file

stentry.p: The date the DIAGNOSTIC CONDITION was entered for the A&amp;SP patient
Identification of an A&amp;SP condition through a method of consistent analysis.
